title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: Sometimes thought like "what happens if you are attacked and while trying to defend yourself, the person dies", flies through my mind and I just wonder if I can live with the consciousness that i have taken a soul.I mean it will be as if the person will always come and hunt me in the dream.I respect all the military men out there.

comments.author: rwishmila
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on September 30, 2023, 08:09:10 PMSometimes thought like "what happens if you are attacked and while trying to defend yourself, the person dies", flies through my mind and I just wonder if I can live with the consciousness that i have taken a soul.I mean it will be as if the person will always come and hunt me in the dream.I respect all the military men out there.If it's not intentional, professional therapy might be helpful. However, such a situation can disturb you deeply, leading to mental disorders sometimes. It's always best to try to make your life guilt-free. The fact that even such thoughts disturb you means you have a good heart. Continue to be good, stay positive!
